tasks.label: Deploy CORS fix v1.10.11
tasks.command: npx wrangler deploy --config packages/workers/outseta-plan-worker/wrangler.toml && npx wrangler deploy --config packages/workers/cvr-worker/wrangler.toml && git add -A && git commit -m "v1.10.11: add www.anvisninger.dk to ALLOWED_ORIGINS in both workers" && git push origin main
